profile.role: Japan / Master's student of Information Systems / Engineer

selfIntro.title: About Me
selfIntro.content:
A first-year master's student majoring in Information Systems at Toyama Prefectural University.
During junior high and high school, I played Splatoon for 5000 hours. I was a self-proclaimed 'useless person' who slept during class and played games until morning after getting home.
Disgusted with myself, I decided to change.
I entered graduate school in 2025 and plan to study abroad for a year in 2026 to realize my dreams.
